original: Edlund, Ernst Otto, skogschef, Boxholm, f. 10/:10/86 i Svärdsjö, Kopparb. 1., av skogsförvalt. Ernst E. o. Amalia Grafström. G. 18 m. Karin Johansson. Barn: Hans f. 19, Erik 25. — Moig:ex. i Gävle 06, utex. fr. skogsinst. 13. Res. t. Schw^eiz 39, Finl. 46. Anst. v. Kopparbergs & Ho-fors Sågverks A-B 05-09, skogsind:-assist. i Umeå distr. 14, assist, i Sten-sele revir 15 o. 16, överjägmäst :assist. i ö. distr. 16, bränslekomm. distr :-chef i Sömmens distr. 17, skogschefs-assist. v. Boxholms A-B 18-37, förest, f. Jernkont. kolarsk. i Boxiholm 21, dito f. statens kolarsk. där 36 o. 37, skogschef v. Boxholms A-B sed. 37. Ordf. i Gösitrings härads vägh:distr. 19-29, ordf. i Ekeby hembygdsfören. sed. 37, ordf. i Boxholms skyttefören. 25-45, ordf. o. styr:led. i ett flert. vägsamfälligh., ordf. o. rev. i ett flert. elektr. distrib :fören., rev. i Göstrings Härads o. Skeninge Stads Sparbank 31.
translated: Edlund, Ernst Otto, forestry manager, Boxholm, b. 10/10/86 in Svärdsjö, Kopparberg County, son of forestry administrator Ernst E. and Amalia Grafström. Married in 1918 to Karin Johansson, with children: Hans (b. 1919) and Erik (b. 1925). Completed military service in Gävle in 1906 and forestry institute diploma in 1913. Traveled to Switzerland in 1939 and Finland in 1946. Employed by Kopparbergs & Hofors Sågverks A-B from 1905-1909, forestry assistant in Umeå district in 1914, assistant in Stensele district in 1915-1916, assistant to the chief district forest officer in northern district in 1916, fuel commission district chief in Sömmens district in 1917, forestry manager assistant at Boxholms A-B from 1918-1937, superintendent of the Jernkont. charcoal school in Boxholm in 1921, superintendent of the state charcoal school there in 1936-1937, forestry manager at Boxholms A-B since 1937. Chairman of the Gösitrings road district from 1919-1929, chairman of the Ekeby Local History Society from 1937, chairman of the Boxholms Shooting Society from 1925-1945, chairman and board member of several road associations, chairman and reviewer of several electric distribution companies, reviewed Göstrings Härads and Skeninge Stads Savings Bank in 1931.

reviewer.name: Göstrings Härads och Skeninge Stads Sparbank
